title: 怎么样可以让mt保留被插件修改过的物品名称和lore
author: 五月菌
txt_content: RT如何用魔改mod保留名称和lore.

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
输出物品的<ID>后加上.withTag(display:{display:{Name:"xxx",Lore:["xxx","xxx"]});

试试?

replies.author: 五月菌
replies.txt_content:
折叠 发表于 2020-3-24 21:57
输出物品的后加上.withTag(display:{display:{Name:"xxx",Lore:["xxx","xxx"]});

试试?
好的一会试试

replies.author: 五月菌
